subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants rushed to a 21-0 lead in the first half and hung on to beat the Cowboys in a winner-take-all clash for the division title and the last spot in the playoffs.
snippet: The Giants rushed to a 21-0 lead in the first half and hung on to beat the Cowboys in a winner-take-all clash for the division title and the last spot in the playoffs.
